SECTION_CONTENT:
Precautions for Safe Handling: Avoid contact with skin, eyes and clothing. Avoid
breathing. Observe all local regulations when handling and storing this substance. Store in
accordance with 10 CFR 20.
Conditions for Safe Storage: Store in radioactive materials area.
